title: The Meldrum Tapes: Best Of
brief_description: The program “The Meldrum Tapes” has given Australian audiences an opportunity to see another side of their favourite performers, in informal discussions, with Ian “Molly” Meldrum. This video shows Molly talking to the Rolling Stones, Genesis, Madonna, Elton John, Bob Geldof, Icehouse, The Models, Sting, Billy Joel, Cyndi Lauper and the Eurythmics.
